alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dale and northeastern Coffee Counties through 245 PM CST... At 200 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Rucker, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, New Brockton, Ariton, Mixons Crossroads, Bells Crossroads, Dill, Hooper Stage Field, Mabson, Arguta, Clintonville, Dale County Lake, Marley Hill, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Phillips Crossroads, Hwy 231 Pea River Bridge, Woodland Grove Church, Java and Greater Salem Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
